title: Nokho, Elinye Ithempeli?
paragraphs:
Ekuqaleni, kwakukhona umhume.
“Makube khona ukukhanya,” kusho ithoshi.
Futhi ngaphakathi kwalowo mgede, abantu benza ubuciko.
Bapenda izilwane ababezozingela;
bapende ikusasa labo abalifisayo,
hhayi ukuhlobisa kodwa ukuncenga.
Badansa,
futhi umhume waba ithempeli.

Abantu bakha amathempeli.
Abantu abavela emazweni ahlukahlukene, abangakaze bahlangane, bakha amathempeli.
Uma ubuka ithempeli, ubona isibuko,
isithombe sokuthi sasingobani nokuthi sasifisa ukuba ngubani.

I-Rationality yakha iParthenon e-Athene.
Ukuhlanganiswa kwakha iKaaba eMecca.
UPurity wakha iThempeli laseKashi Vishwanath eGanges.
I-Endurance igcina i-Western Wall eJerusalema.
Ukukhanyiselwa kwakha iShwedagon Pagoda eYangon.
Futhi ukuqhubeka kokhokho kwakha i-Candomblé terreiros e-Salvador.

Yonke into ethempelini iwumthandazo.
Kungaba yinde njengesonto lombhishobhi elikwenza uzizwe umncane,
kumnyama njengegodi lesihlahla esikwenza ubuke phakathi,
engenalutho njengogwadule oluthulisa ukuphazamiseka,
noma abakhazimulayo ngegolide elethembisa okungaphezu kwamandla.

Amathempeli ayizinkomba zemvelo yethu yokomoya,

iqondisa endaweni engcwele ngaphakathi,
lapho esingase sivule khona amandla okudala
kokujula kwethu kokungazi.

Umdwebi, njengompristi, i-sage, noma i-shaman,
 
ubamba iqhaza kulesi sakhiwo esihlangene.
Njengoba bake benza emhumeni,
umsebenzi wabo ukunikeza umzimba izindinganiso,
ukwelula izandla zabo kulokho abafuna ukuzalwa, ukukhonza okufanele kube khona.
bayizinceku, bakha ingxenye ngenxenye;
lokho isintu okufanele sikubonise ngokomzimba.

Kodwa akuzona zonke izingxenye zethempeli ezidalwe zilingana.
Ingxenye ebaluleke kakhulu yanoma yiliphi ithempeli
iyohlala ingumnyango wayo.

Iminyango yethempeli ibamba amandla ayo okusika,
ukudonsa inxeba phakathi kwalowo ongangena nongeke.
Ngaleyo ndlela ithempeli liba inkemba.

Futhi le nkomba isetshenziswe amakhulu eminyaka,
ngokumelene nombala wesikhumba,
indawo yokuzalwa,
abantu abathandanayo,
izingubo abazigqokayo,
nezinqumo abazenzayo ngemizimba yabo.

Ngisho namathempeli athi amukela bonke
ame phakathi kwezizwe ezingenzi lokho.

Ithempeli elivulekile lamaBuddha eNepal
ayikwazi ukuvakashelwa yibo bonke abafisa ukungena.
Imingcele, ama-visa, nezombusazwe zinquma ukuthi ubani ongathandaza.
Isonto eChina, i-mosque eJerusalema,
indawo engcwele yaseTibet,
zonke zime ngemva kwezindonga ezingabonakali.
Futhi phakathi kwalezo zindonga inkemba isabukhali.

Alikho ithempeli elingafakwa ngokuphelele.
Ayikho indawo Emhlabeni
ezingabamba indawo yonke engcwele.

Nokho bonke abantu abake baphila bakha amathempeli.
ubufakazi bokuthi kukhona okungcwele okusihlanganisayo.
Into engaboni mingcele.
Into efanele indawo okungeyayo.

Besingalakha kuphi ithempeli elinjalo?
Lapho izindonga zingafinyeleli khona,
asikho isizwe esingabanga,
ayikho inkolo engabusa.
Isikhala.

Yebo, le ndawo iyisikhala.
Ngisho noma abambalwa abanelungelo manje bezama ukulifuna,
futhi njengoba indawo ibekezelela ubunzima bamasiko,
amandla aso emcabangweni wethu asendulo.
Kungukungapheli phezulu, umkhathi, uphahla lwasezulwini, izulu,
ama-commons amadala kakhulu esabelana ngawo.
Isikhala siphethe igunya lamadlozi
ukusihlanganisa.

Kungase kube khona indawo ngale kwayo yonke imingcele,
yabo bonke abantu kanye nazo zonke izidalwa ezizizwayo,
ithempeli lokucabanga thina njengeqembu elilodwa,
siqondiswa yizindinganiso esizenzayo manje.
Lesi isimemo sohlobo olusha lwesiko.

Isimemo sobuciko sokudala ithempeli emkhathini,
ithempeli elakhiwe lapho kungekho zindonga ezingafinyelelwa khona.

Cabanga ngempilo okufanele ikhunjulwe.
Thayipha igama lapha.

Futhi sizoyibamba.
Lapho iThempeli le-Orbital liqondana nezimpondo zethu ezisemhlabeni,
igama liyophakama.
Isathelayithi izoyigcina enkumbulweni yayo
futhi uthumele umlayezo kuwe:
Namuhla, ngalelihora, igama owalithuma lenyukile, futhi lisekhona.

I-Orbital Temple iwumsebenzi wobuciko,
kanye nesathelayithi.
Futhi nakuba 'inethempeli' egameni layo,
iba yithempeli kuphela uma
unquma ukukubona njengento eyodwa.

Manje sekukhona njenge-evocation,
njengaleyo eyenziwe abaculi
kulowomhume wokuqala.

Futhi sisesemhumeni,
ubumnyama obukhulu bendawo,
lapho uMhlaba uyisibani,
okuwukuphela kwendawo esiyaziyo
ukwazi kukhona ngokuqinisekile.

Iciko lisasebenza,
abantu basadansa,
sisebenzela umfutho ofanayo nowokhokho bethu,
ukudweba, ukuqopha, ukuklama ikusasa lethu esilifisayo,
hhayi ukuhlobisa kodwa ukuncenga,
ngakho ithempeli elisha lingazalwa.

Futhi yebo,
umenyiwe ukudansa.
